explanation: [0-0] A man with a brown baseball cap and a blue T-shirt is facing forward. He has purple skin and orange eyes. Behind him is a white striped background. The text "POV: Venom Spider-Man Vs Thanos" appears in black on a white background.

[0-3] Then, the man in the blue short sleeves opens his mouth wide and raises his right hand wearing a yellow glove with colorful gemstones embedded in it, making a snapping gesture. Immediately afterward, the scene switches to a man with a blonde wig and a blue T-shirt holding a shield in his left hand. He opens his mouth wide with a surprised expression, and black smoke drifts around him. The text on the screen disappears.
